sections.screen: n8n 账户设置录屏 · n8n 仪表盘录屏 · 虚拟主播讲解（带 “Your Blueprint:” 字幕）

sections.read_srt: One: Find a real problem people want solved. Two: Source or build the n8n automation. Three: Abstract away the complexity with a simple UI. Four: Make the output polished and useful. Five: Choose a business model and launch.
